tool_description:
Real-time amazon data API. Get product, reviews and keyword details. Easy to use and reliable
I'm on Telegram https://t.me/logicBuilder

name: Amazon Product/Reviews/Keywords
title: Amazon Product/Reviews/Keywords

api_list.name: Product Search (Supports all countries)
api_list.description: The endpoint returns products from the Amazon Search Result

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description:
Perform search in the specific category

To get list of available categories you can use endpoints: ** /categories**

Default is **aps** - means 'All Categories'

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Marketplace country

        US: 'www.amazon.com',

api_list.name: Product Reviews (Supports all countries)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Page number

Default: 1

1 page can contain 10 reviews

optional_parameters.name: variants
optional_parameters.description:
If a product has multiple product variants, then by default you will receive reviews related to all product variants. If you need reviews only for specified ASIN then set it to **0**

- 1 - reviews for all product variants (default)
- 0 - reviews only for specified product ASIN

optional_parameters.name: filter_by_star
optional_parameters.description:
Filter reviews by stars. Empty value will return all reviews

- '' - return all reviews(default)
- 1 - return only 1 star reviews
- 2 - return only 2 star reviews
- 3 - return only 3 star reviews
- 4 - return only 4 star reviews
- 5 - return only 5 star reviews

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:

optional_parameters.name: top
optional_parameters.description: By default reviews will be sorted by \\\"Most Recent\\\" reviews, if you need to sort them by \\\"Top Reviews\\\" then set this value to 1

api_list.name: Get list of categories
api_list.description:
Get list of available categories

In order to search for the product in the specific category you need a valid category name and this endpoint can be used to view available categories by Countries
